name: Excavator
description: Excavators are heavy construction equipment consisting of a boom, dipper, bucket and cab on a rotating platform known as the house. The house sits atop an undercarriage with tracks or wheels. They are a natural progression from the steam shovels and often mistakenly called power shovels. Wikipedia

name: Backhoe
description: A backhoe — also called rear actor or back actor — is a type of excavating equipment, or digger, consisting of a digging bucket on the end of a two-part articulated arm. It is typically mounted on the back of a tractor or front loader, the latter forming a 'backhoe loader
